entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
